channel.title: Project G3
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys, I really want to build an ultimate server, and I can't do it on my own.
[size=10pt][b]~~Project G3~~[/b][/size] Project G3 will be a server and client that was started by me, Galkon, and will evolve into the most amazing server ever. Project G3 will most likely take awhile to develope, as all great servers do, and will require advanced coders for both servers and clients.
[b]~Goals~[/b] -100% working skills (besides construction and hunter obviously) -100% Castle Wars, with working tickets -God Wars (I can do) -Clan Wars -Third age zone -0% lag, 100% stability -Enables fun gameplay for all types of players; skillers, rangers, warriors, mages -more when i think of it lol
[b]~Development Team~[/b] Galkon MasterBacus
[/center]

item.title: Project G3
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

[center]Hey guys, I really want to build an ultimate server, and I can’t do it on my own.

[size=10pt]Project G3[/size]
Project G3 will be a server and client that was started by me, Galkon, and will evolve into the most amazing server ever. Project G3 will most likely take awhile to develope, as all great servers do, and will require advanced coders for both servers and clients.

~Goals~
-100% working skills (besides construction and hunter obviously)
-100% Castle Wars, with working tickets
-God Wars (I can do)
-Clan Wars
-Third age zone
-0% lag, 100% stability
-Enables fun gameplay for all types of players; skillers, rangers, warriors, mages
-more when i think of it lol

~Development Team~
Galkon
MasterBacus

[/center]

Read full topic
